thread.title: Early Facebook Investor Seeks Retail Investors With New Listing
thread.title_full: Early Facebook Investor Seeks Retail Investors With New Listing

title: Early Facebook Investor Seeks Retail Investors With New Listing
text:
Early Facebook Investor Seeks Retail Investors With New Listing HarbourVest Fund to Start Trading on LSE Main Market Wednesday By simon.clark@wsj.com Sept. 8, 2015 5:39 a.m. ET 
HarbourVest Global Private Equity Ltd., an early investor in Facebook Inc., will start trading on the main section of the London Stock Exchange Wednesday, the latest attempt by a private-equity firm to attract individual investors. 
The publicly traded fund, which first sold shares in 2007 targeting institutional investors, is managed by Boston-based HarbourVest Partners LLC, which has invested more than $25 billion in private equity... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Popular on WSJ
